text: meka 12.25 weddiwath liyala iwarawela pablish karannath oone.
hariyatama 200weni post ekedi mama “warna” yata maru una..
pradhana deshanaya aacharya pranith abhayasundarageni.
gedara wada nawathilada?
hondama wade neda.

mulika tharaga wataye di ek ek kandawala peramuna ganna kandayam kusalana tharaga isawwe awasan purwa tharaga watayata ekwana athara ema tharagawaladi jaya labana kandayam kusalana tharaga isawwe awasan maha tharagayata da parajayata pathwana kandayam palanga shuratha awasan maha tharagayata da ekawethi.
koheda paththu wenne kaluware..
ude ma nagitta hatiye yaluwekuta kol ekak gaththa...
chuti malli supar siks kiyana hena gobba film ekaka moda jok charithayakata hitiya.
tresi inne meksikowe da?
owun owani panthiyakatath awashya mudala soyaganne amaruwen.
menna thawath yahapalana jayagrahanayak!
ti-shart saha mesa lali
badowi aya thamayi sathun athikaranne.

lowa muhuna di sitina saranagatha prashnayen yuropa sangamayata sidu karana balapama pilibandawa athamun athishayokthiyen huwa dakwamin sitina bawayi, ejapa brithanya shakhawe prathiwadi parshawaye sabhapathi nithiwedi harshaka kannangara me athara bibisi sandeshayata kiya sitiye.
parlimenthu wishesha karaka sabhawa
thariyata wechcha wade..
man danne kohomada daruwo owwa..
shri lankawe eelaga abhiyogaya olimpik haraha lokayama jayaganima yi
nuthanathwayaye athi saba prashna nisa sadbhawayen yuthuwa eyata erehiwana piris lankawe nathuwa nowe.
bhugoliyawa nowa minisunge hadawath ek kirimen eksath ratak goda nagiya hakke ithihasayen igena ganimeni.

duppath kama nathi karanna, duppathunge daruwanta shishyathwa denna maha parimana wadasatahan bihi karanawata wada lesiyi, gedarata ena elawalu wikunana ammagen, malu welendagen aadi wu duppathungen kewal nokara owunta sadharana milak di owun wikunana de miladi ganna eka.

"namal rajapaksha ha bharatha lakshman premachandra unnahege doniyanda athara aadara huta patayak thibi eya namalge maniyanda hata dana gannata labi..eyin aya mahath se kopayata path wima haraha pawul deka athara wirasakayak nirmanaya wu bawath...

aapada kalamanakarana niyojya amathya garu dunesh gankanda, aapada kalamanakarana amathyansha lekam, aapada kalamanakarana madhyasthanaye adhyaksha jenaral, jathika godanagili paryeshana sanwidhanaye adhyaksha jenaral, kalagunawidya departhamenthu adhyaksha jenaral saha warimarga departhamenthu niyojanaya karamin niyojithayin athulu niladharin mema awasthawata sahabhagi wiya
"monada gembiye katha nokara karanne..kan birida?
emathuda nowa haya masayakata sarayak maththala sita kolambaata guwanin gos eelanga flayit eken maththalata paminimata haki bawa ohu pemwathiyata kiweya.
skandha pahakin (rupa, wedana aadi) nimawi athi me shariraya aathma yana sthira wenas nowana dharmathawak nowe.
kanagatuwata karuna meka minissu dethun denekuta wada therenne nathi ekayi.
ee wagakima pahara hari palakayakuta nawatha warak rate palana balaya illimata ayithiyak adda?
teliwishan patangaththa kale honda wada tikak kalane.
ohu thurkinta sambandhayak naha.
ohu nawatha genwagannata puluwan da?
math ekka katha karanna.
thama as arala nathi pus patiyek ganata mama eeka balagannawa.
aanduwe chanda aduwimata ha aasana kipayakin paradimata pradhanama hethun dekak atha.
sathya thaththwaya meyayi.

awurudu lan weth ma rathu ha kaha pahathi kajupuhulan walin kaju gas sarasi siti idunu kanු puhulam soya ena lenun, pakshin genda kaju gas alankara we rathriye di ma wawulo ranchu pitin kaju gas kara adi ethi..
17 wani siyawase gam ratawal soyamin aagiya pruthugisi gaweshakayin atharin pirisakata ba්rasilaye aluth nagarayak hamuwuna.
gatha wu kalaya: sathi 2ka ta pasuwa
sithami mama eya.
eewa samanya minissu oona tharam ahuwa.
ese siduwi aththe owunta thama abiman yatagiyawa (abhimanawath) pilibanda awadhanayak danimak nathi heyini.
ethakota eya dakke bimmala mita bada ganna wath bari tharam mahatha maha wisala kudayak bawa.
nasismika rogiyata awashya hakithak thamage nasismika awashyatha itukara ganimata.
oba obema hadawathin ahanna.
namuth nithipathi departhamenthuwa ada nidrashili lesa katayuthu karanawa.
ee janamadhyawedin idiriyata yama pinisayi.
hambanthota magampura waraye widesha naw dekak prana apayata ganime siduwima mada amarikanu nawika hamudawe adhi thakshanika widyuth upanga saha sensara u...
man nam kamathi modarn eewata.
eya nithi wirodhi ya.
aaye nam igena gannawa boru.intawal eken passe aapu guruwaruth aapu wegenma harawala yawwa panthiya athule wathura pennala.
kohomada sindi ekata danne?

katana aasanaya 1959 di migamuwa aasanayen kotasak wen wi katana aasanaya nirmanaya wuna. 1988 - 2010 kala samaye shri lanka nidahas pakshaya pramukha pilen janadhipathiwaru theri path wana wita ema parshwaya jayagrahanaya kala katana ithiri awasthawaladi jayagrahanaya kale eksath jathika pakshaya pramukha pilayi.
ehema ekek eekama sidda wena deshapalaneta banina eka khedawachakayak neweyi nam hina yanawa macho!
eeth niwasata gena eemata mata wirodha ellawunu nisa ee adahasa athaharala andata aawath mata ninda giye na.
malahiru basa yana mohothaka owun palingu hadawatha ‘oon chi’ ge dhiwara oruwa athulen thibba.
janamadhyawedaya igena ganna me widiyowa balanna
ema sathyaya ranil wikrasinha mahathata ada janadhipathi lekam karyalaye di ee sathya pasak wuye yam eya ratatath, ejapayatath, jathika aanduwatath, janadhipathiwarayatath hodaya.
rajya amathya - rawindra samarawira mathithuma garu.
ee jalaya ekras kota bera sagarayata yawana ekthara aakarayaka jala margayak da washayeni.
halawatha sita nawuka sathapum 18 k pamana gambauru muhudedi mema pirisa athadanguwata gath bawayi nawika hamudawa sandahan kale.
wena kenek nam ekko ellum gahe !
ehema kiyana gaman eya mage atha alla gaththa.
para sathuru uwaduru raten athuga dammata passen pahu raja kirikiriye dilihena aluminiyan kaduwa aragena istej ekata naginakota aththamayi apita chu yana tharam aathal ya.
tika durak yaddima ashwaya kura gahanna patan gaththa.
aruthak dimata nohaki...
rupiyal hathalihakata me mohothe kama labadun mudalali mahatha dewiyekayi ohuta sithe.
kridawe wiwidha madili pawathunath wadath janapriya wanne pihinima, papadi dhawanaya saha diwima athulath aakaraya yi.
ee kiyanne mathiniya ge kale lankawe aarthikaya je.aar. ge kaleta wada wegen wardhanaya wela thiyenawa.
batahira widyaweth kramawedaya hithalu kiyana eka pamanayi.
pahatha widiyowa eeta kadima udaharanayak sapayayi.
ada jathika wyaparayeth weswalagath makswadin innawa.
(ee madiwata mun tika kiyonawa mahinda shilanipa ta kelewwalu!
ee osse age rangapam gana thawaduratath thahawuru wuna.
mata hithenawa nago kella kolla gana unandu wenna ikman wuna wadiyi kiyala.
ape gedarata kisi deyak danenna thiyanna epa..."

danata me pilibandawa lankawe jiwathwu bauddha widwathek ha ugathekuwu hitapu adhyapana adhyakshaka ke. es. palihakkara mahatha wisin rachitha “mithya prathiharya nathi budu dahama” namathi granthayen pahatha sandahan kotasa uputa dakwannata kamaththemu.
dewlowa da soradetuwa owunge detuwa wiya.

melesa kalawa ha huwamaru shramaya athara sambandhatha dakwima ho sanskruthika nishpadana ha paribhogika bhanda wandanawa athara sambandhatha dakwima ho sampradayika kala wicharayata nogalapena bawa kiwa mana nowe.
api hamoma ekawageyi.
ee widisha wiya nohakiya.
owunge illima wuye swechcha sewayaka niratha wana daham pasal guruwarun muhuna di sitina niwasa gatalu wisandimata upakara karana lesayi.
sinharajaye hamuwana wanajiwin pilibanda da sisun danumwath karana ladi.
gini ganime siddhin pilibandawa ha huwada kramayen aduwi giyeya.
eelanga eka idiri mathiwaranayen paksha dekatama thaniwa aanduwak pihituwaganna bari wunama thamayi jathika aanduwaka awashyathawa thiyenne.
samahara dinawala ohu nidi waragena pandara yamaya wana thuru liyanawa.
rabana palunu handa apita kar eka athuledima ahuna.jayamangala gatha kiyapu ganu lamayingen konema hitiya ganu lamayanam hadayi.anith ayanam harima goraka thama.
athithaye manthra balayen nopeni yama, ahasin yama, washi kirima, wirasaka kirima, gal palima, gal unu kirima, noyek de mawima, angam pilli aadi noyek guptha kramayan thulin wiskam dakwi ya.

- es.shridharan (252)  illim 05k mulika karagena udghoshana pawathwannemu - em.ke.shiwajilingam (251)  wasa athi doratu yam dineka bindadamannemu (250)  jiniwahidi labadun porondu shri lankawa itukarayida? (249)  lankika pawulak ratin pituwahal kirimata erehiwa pelagasunu oostreliyanuwo ! (249)  demala janathawata anathurudayaka thathwayak ! (249)  hirunikage difendaraya muda hari ! (248)  rathnapura pathalakin kes palinguwak hamuwe (245)  eelama sasala kala kokkadicholeyi ghathanaye 29 wana anusmaranaya ! (245)  yoshitha, rohan, nishantha athulu 4k athadanguwe! (245)  shiwajilingam kalu kodi wirodhathawayakata saraseyi (243)  rajakiya widyalaye widuhalpathi iwathata (243)  therawadi bhikshu kathikawatha kalina awashyathawak ! (243)  wyawasthawa sambandhayen sakachchawak! (243)  deshapalagnyayin demala janathawa godurak karagena ! (242)  rajaye nirdeshama demala jathika sandhanayath idiripath karayi ! (242)  nawa aandukrama wyawasthawata indiyawen sahaya ! (241)  damila chithrapatayakata naduwak ! (241)  sambandhanta prathikshepa kala nohaki yojanawaliya ! (240)  wasara 25 kata pasu kankasanthuraya nadeshwara widuhala nawatha aarambha kirimata thiranaya karayi (240)  indiya widesha lekam shri lankawata (239)  jathiwadaya hisa osawa atha - daglas dewanandan (239)  shri lankawata erehi aparadha adhikaranayak (239)  randawiyan nidahas karanna - komisamata paminillak (238)  maha amathige niwedanayata athsan na !
bohomayak rogin suwa wi atha.
mama thawath duka hithunu siduwimak kiyannam.

thilak, nishantha, jagath riki paraka me sambandhawa kafe sanwidhanaya nikuth kara athi niwedanaye sandahan wanne 2018 marthu 13 dina (ada) chanda wimasima sadaha nama yojana laba di nama yojana prathikeshpa wu thilak wirasinha, nishantha wimalachandra, jagath pathirana yana pudgalayin maharagama nagara sabhawata pamina palamu raswima pawathwena sthanaya, ehi katayuthu sidu karana aakaraya pilibada wimasa ehi thana thana awida gos thaman sabha warayata sahabhagiwana bawa hagi yana ayurin katayuthu kara thibena bawaya.
naththan oowa balala mamath nasthi wenawa...

aththa sinduwa...api hinda sahakariya samahara welawata koyi tharam duk windinawada...ee welawata hithenawa me githaya koyi tharam aththada kiyala...
honda nirmanayak kiyala mama hithana nirmanayi, ehema nowena eewayi wen karana bedum rekhawa mama andinne idiripath kirima mulika karagena.
ee anuwa owun sayikosikayanya.
wideshiya ratawalin aanayanaya karana sahal janathawa paribhojanaya nokarana bawa sajith premadasa prakasha kaleya.
wathman janadhipathi apekshaka sajith premadasa niwasa sanwardhanaya amathyanshaye wyapruthi niwasak lushanta labadunne iwak bawak nomathiwayi.

yuda aparadha gana soyanne nam prabhakaran wasara 30 k thisse kala bihisunu aparadha gana sewimata amarikawa krita nokale manda ohu dusim ganan siwil wasiyan bomba thaba ghathanaya karaddi amarikawa kale ema siduwima hela dakima pamanaki.

asanka oya kiyanne waraddak dutu thana katha kirima.
dan masa ganak thisse mata hambuwenawa.
wayasa awurudu 16 n pasu ohu muhuna dun siyaluma wibhagawala lakunu 100% k laba ganima nisa boho denekuge awadhanaya dina ganimata samathwa atha.
farade itha bhakthimath katholikayeku wu athara kuda sanchemeniyan nikaye samajikayek wiya.

pa්rabhakaran parajaya karana awasthawa wanawita aithihasika arthayen samastha samaja ka්ramaya se ma samastha deshapalana aayathana ka්ramayada purna pa්rathisandhanayakata ha pa්rathisanwidhanayakata lak nokota idiriyata ya nohaki tharamata ee siyalla gara halunu thaththwayakata pathwa thibuneya.
ee thrastha praharaya samangama polisiya ha hamudawa kriyathmaka wimeni.
minisun mehema aathmarthakamiwa hasirena aakarayata hethu sewwoth narakada?

eheth saka­yak wini nam ohu kala yuthuwa thibune ee parsa­laya muhu­data wisi kara­nawa wenu­wata poli­si­yata bhara denna­taya.
mamath ee hinayata yanna udaw karanawa.
elambaa bhagyawathun wahanse sakasa wanda ekathpaseka sitiye ya.
thorana saha kurusaya yana dekehima pinthura uththaraya samanga balaporoththuwanna.

ema awasthawedi uwasiyage sithiwilla pilibandawa awadhanaya yomukala budurajanan wahanse pahadili karanu labuye thaman sihi kala yuththeda, wimasa baliya yuththeda thama kala nokala de pilibandawa wana bawaya.

nawum kiri, yogat samata ithamath hithakarayi.
me kament eka nam mawa danna kenekge wiya yuthuyi.
wayambaa palatha anagathaye di sidukala yuthu wadapiliwela mathiwarana kalaye di mama eli dakwuwa.

nawa wyawasthawen dewani mantha්ri mandalayak path karimata yojanawak idiripathwa aththe da madhyama rajayata siyalu jana rashiwala sahabhagithwaya laba ganimata saha ee thulin madhya rajaya rakaganimata owun thula bandimak athi karu ganimata.
anthimata surekama thamange puka tikak udata ussala payiye topa thamange hila athulata daganna samath wuna.
wiwidha mathruka kipayak gana apa athara athi wu keti katha baha nirayasayen yomu wuye lekhaka karyayan pilibandawaya.
api idikirim aarambha karanawath ekkama adala awasaraya labadenna kiyala wanajiwi adhyaksha janaralta lipiyak idiripath kala.
eelangata jarmaniye mewa wikunawi.
me badda paribhogikayin matha nopatawa bankuwalin ayakaraganna bawata prodakari satahanak thibenawa.

ithin ada onna aayema liyanna patan gannawa hode.

me dinawala widuli bayisikal gath aya, eewaye batari wala swabhawika jiwitha kalaya awasan wu pasu nawatha eewa aluthen damima wiyadam yana karyayak saha, lehesiyen eewa soya ganimata nohakiya yayi ekthara pituwaka liya thibini.
mama danna dewal idiriyedith oyalath ekkama bedagannawa..
pawathina deshapalana arbudaya sambandhayen eksath jathinge sanwidhanaye niyojithayin dadi madihath wimak sidukaramin ek ek deshapalana pakshawalatada balapam sidu kara athi bawa wartha we.
santhoshaya samawitama anugamanaya karanne kawadawath oba nodanna sewanallak lesayi.

wiktar ayiwan palakayata ha palaka pakshayata rate podu wasthuwa kollakamata ha athpath karaganimata labi thibena balaya ho ayithiya lankawe warthamana aandukramaye thibena lokuma doshaya lesa salakiya hakiya.
sakakaruwan athara sisun pasdenaku ha sisuwiyan thidenek wethi.
nawathath piyawi sihiyata paminiyeya.
meya thawamath kara ganimata nohaki wuwaki.
eheth warthamanaye janathawa thora pathkaraganu labana rajya nayakaya janathawa atharata yanne adala karya mandalawalata ayath pradhanin da samangini.

rajapaksha rejimaya merata drawida basa kathakarana shri lankawe janathawage subhasiddhiyata winashakari wipath gena dena palanayak washayen salaka drawida eksath sandhanaya kapa wanuye wenasak saha sadharana wu kriyawata nanwiya haki thirasara deshapalana wisandumakata yamataya.
ooki liyana ewwa therum ganna amaru unath wadeta enna inne...
''athule un kihipa denek mahindawa kawa'' - kumara welgama.
dhaiyirya ha shakthiya thawa thawath liyannta
robi kiyanne nikamma nikam mashin ekak.
@ hasiya - hithata aawa liwwa..eth matath ekaparatama kiyawala therum ganna amaru una.
maha maga adhika shithalen saha kusa ginnen niraharawa miyayana pirisak da ithama pohosathun jiwath wana saha ithama balawath ratawal athara urenura gatena indiyawe siti.
ee sakakaruwan ada yapanaya mahesthrath es.sadistharan hamuwata idiripath kirimen anathuruwayi.
niyojya amathya jesi alawathuwala pawasuwe ema niladhari mandalaya kawudayi ada thiranaya nokala bawa ya.
oyata oonenam man kes ekata sahaya wenna, man karannam.
ma me bawa penwa dun wita ek sinhala minisaku pawasuwe muslim minisunta mada peradiga ha pakisthanaya wani ratawalin aadhara labena bawa ha owun sathuwa awi aayudha thibena bawayi.
hindi bhashawen "rashta gith" yanuwen kiyawenne "jathika giya" yannayi.
oowata damma idala huru wenna thibune...
"kohoma hari adama me rathu oolu dadu hatha hoyaganda oona...thawa sathiyak balan inda ba..."
rathu pata malumiris [kapsikam]
api hamadama harena bong eke rupe apata mathakayi.
sak riya skanarayakin yam kisi wikirana p ramanayak wihiduwa ehi parawarthanaya nirikshanaya karanu labayi.
sathya yanu sathyama pamani.
